input_text.Prompt:
Item name:
Magnaflow 35168 Stainless Steel 2.25" Exhaust Tip

Item features:
Reduces exhaust gas pressure and enhances the performance of the exhaust system
Manufactured from high-strength stainless steel
Mirror-like finish
Easy to install
Corrosion resistant
Backed by a lifetime warranty

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Magnaflow direct-fit catalytic converters are designed for easy bolt-on installation for the professional installer. Each is designed to exact the original equipment specifications. While the majority of the direct-fit catalytic converter products do not require welding, cutting, or bending, limited applications may require additional welding for optimal installation. All federal catalytic converters meet EPA requirements and are constructed from stainless steel. Unfortunately, federal catalytic converters are not legal for sale or use on vehicles registered in the state of California.
input_text.Response B: Magnaflow Stainless Steel 2.25" Exhaust Tip is designed to reduce exhaust gas pressure and enhance the performance of the exhaust system. It is manufactured from high-strength stainless steel and comes in a mirror-like finish. This exhaust tip features a 2.25-inch tip. It is corrosion-resistant, easy to install, and backed by a lifetime warranty.

label_annotations.factors_a: It did not talk about the item in question, instead talking about catalytic converters. It also did not try to sell it very well and gave no information that the prompt had given. Looked up California law to see if they were factually correct and it seems catalytic converters are illegal in California due to anti-tampering laws.
label_annotations.factors_b: Short, concise and to the point. However, very cut and paste from the prompt.
